name: Tycoon Blast
description:
Tycoon Blast brings you carnival fun!

Work your way through matching two or more blocks of the same color and creating boosters to clear levels!

If you have ever played other puzzle game, you will know how different this game is. The delicate graphics design and 3D model, practical tasks, and unique game experience with the unique sound and visual effects.

Clicking two cubes of the same color or the tools will bring you a feeling of excitement and pleasure.

Collect more tools to finish the task easier and unlock more levels. This game is for both adults and kids.

How to play:
* Tap at least 2 cubes of the same color to eliminate them
* Use different tools to accelerate elimination.
* Try to make two tools close to a surprising result.

Features:
* Game of skill
* Exquisite design

Download now and enjoy the game!
